title: Brace.ai: Stavvy
role: Front-end tech leadership & Senior Software Developer
description: Brace was a software-as-a-service (Saas) technology provider whose focus is in the mortgage servicing space. It is an end-to-end mortgage servicing software for loss mitigation.   Over four years, I was in a FE tech leadership position, and participated in all aspects of product development from planning through execution.

title: Cayor Capital
description:
Cayor Capital launched in 2015, as a Sub-Saharan Africa equity fund, focusing on mid-market assets and investments. Upon reaching their investment goal, Cayor required a website update. I worked with the Cayor team to design and develop and maintain thier new, responsive single page app to attract future investments.
 My approach to Cayor was to advocate for a fresh, updated interface that put the investors and portfolio companies first. To make the site user-friendly, we focused on breathing life into the Company decks and transforming the details into designed pages.

title: Aeroasis
description: Aeroasis is a resource autonomy startup with a strong focus on education. I developed an education curricula, designed and developed a platform for teachers and educators to access and interact with the lesson plans. I managed and led in the development of the Aeroasis Website, which led to a 200% increase in visitor traffic and improved company SEO. Created and maintain company shop through Shopify, paypal, and Square. Led development of the Aeroasis Grow App: an IoT connected mobile user app that maintains and controls an indoor garden ecosystem.
